titles.title: Encouraging civilians to observe Veterans Day by listening, with respect and without judgment, to the stories of combat veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 11/3/2011--Introduced. Encourages every civilian to observe Veterans Day by offering to listen to a veteran tell the story of the veteran's time at war and experience since returning home.
